citations.narrative:
There were 4 enclosures housing weaned puppies with empty water bowls. Two of the four enclosures had overturned
water bowls from puppies playing with the bowls. Licensee stated that the puppies are offered water 4 times a day.
Potable water must be continuously available for dogs unless restricted by the attending veterinarian. Failure to provide
water continuously or prevent water receptacles from remaining upright for dogs/puppies could allow the animals to
become thirsty. Licensee must provide water continuously to the dogs/puppies and prevent water receptacles from
overturning. Correct by May 16, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.10(a) 
   
Watering 
There were 4 enclosures housing weaned puppies with empty water bowls. Two of the four enclosures had overturned 
water bowls from puppies playing with the bowls. Licensee stated that the puppies are offered water 4 times a day. 
Potable water must be continuously available for dogs unless restricted by the attending veterinarian. Failure to provide 
water continuously or prevent water receptacles from remaining upright for dogs/puppies could allow the animals to 
become thirsty. Licensee must provide water continuously to the dogs/puppies and prevent water receptacles from 
overturning. Correct by May 16, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
